block.p: BASEBALL American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Placed INF Enrique Wilson on the 15-day disabled list retroactive to July 14. Recalled RHP Tim Drew from Buffalo of the International League. DETROIT TIGERS--Traded INF Gabe Alvarez to the San Diego Padres for 1B-OF Dusty Allen.

BASEBALL American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Placed INF Enrique Wilson on the 15-day disabled list retroactive to July 14. Recalled RHP Tim Drew from Buffalo of the International League. DETROIT TIGERS--Traded INF Gabe Alvarez to the San Diego Padres for 1B-OF Dusty Allen.
National League NEW YORK METS--Placed 3B Robin Ventura on 15-day disabled list, retroactive to July 14. Activated RHP Rick Reed from the 15-day disabled list.
BASKETBALL National Basketball Association DENVER NUGGETS--Signed C Mamadou N'diaye and C Dan McClintock.

FOOTBALL National Football League BUFFALO BILLS--Signed LB Corey Moore and WR Drew Haddad. MINNESOTA VIKINGS--Signed LB Kevin McCullar. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed DE Darren Howard to a five-year contract. Released LB Terrence Miles.

HOCKEY National Hockey League ATLANTA THRASHERS--Agreed to terms with F Donald Audette and F Andreas Karlsson. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Signed G Roman Cechmanek to a one-year contract. PITTSBURGH PENGUINS--Signed F Roman Simicek, F Alexander Zevakhin and F Jan Fadrny. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Signed LW Fredrik Modin and Todd Warriner to multiyear contracts.
COLLEGE BIG SOUTH CONFERENCE--Named Michelle Smith marketing-championships intern. CAMPBELL--Named Doug Hess men's assistant soccer coach.
